message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $18,000. What do you think?
Alice, $18,000 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $10,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents the high-end of the product's value, I understand your budget constraints. Let's meet in the middle - how about $14,000?
Alice, I'm still interested, but $14,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. This is my final offer, let me know what you think.
